Title: Relates to members of a mobile crisis team
Summary: Provides that members of a mobile crisis team shall include at least one behavioral health professional and any combination of certified peer specialists, certified recovery peer advocates, credentialed family peer advocates, and credentialed youth peer advocates.
LawCode: Amd ยง36.03, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to members of a mobile crisis team
